statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'call';
SELECT interaction_id, touchpoint FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type <> 'email' AND touchpoint LIKE '%chat%';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY customer_id ASC, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'email' AND customer_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_interactions
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, touchpoint FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_journey WHERE journey_stage = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT touchpoint_id FROM customer_journey;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Sales' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type HAVING total_interactions >= 5;

SELECT cj.customer_id, cj.journey_stage, ci.interaction_date, ci.interaction_type FROM customer_journey cj INNER JOIN customer_interactions ci ON cj.touchpoint_id = ci.touchpoint_id ORDER BY cj.journey_stage, ci.interaction_date DESC;

SELECT cj.customer_id, cj.interaction_date, ci.interaction_type, cj.feedback FROM customer_journey cj LEFT JOIN customer_interactions ci ON cj.touchpoint_id = ci.touchpoint_id WHERE ci.interaction_type IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_channel = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT touchpoint_name, touchpoint_type, touchpoint_description FROM touchpoints;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_details FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, interactions.interaction_date, touchpoints.touchpoint_name FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN touchpoints ON touchpoints.touchpoint_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number <> '';
SELECT * FROM customer_profile;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profile ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 4;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, touchpoint_id, touchpoint_type FROM customer_touchpoints WHERE touchpoint_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_touchpoints WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_profile ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customer_profile WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_datetime DESC;

SELECT cp.first_name, cp.last_name, cph.product_id FROM customer_profile cp JOIN customer_purchase_history cph ON cp.customer_id = cph.customer_id WHERE cph.purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY cp.last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, purchases.product_name, purchases.total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL AND phone_number LIKE '1%';

SELECT interactions.customer_id, interactions.interaction_date, touchpoints.touchpoint_name FROM interactions JOIN touchpoints ON interactions.interaction_id = touchpoints.touchpoint_id ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
